channel.title: Killing Monsters?
channel.description: Well, you see i downloaded this new server today and i thought i should raise slayer.So i went to the crawling hands and i tried to fight one.I got him to 0 hp,but he regained his health.I check the npc.cfg and checked his hp,but it was 16 and it kept regaining health.How do i fix that?

item.title: Killing Monsters?
item.dc:creator: @kevvdogg kevvdogg
item.description:
